channel.title: CVE Feed for Mergen Software -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mergen Software -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5806|2024-01-18T12:58:31.264Z -- mergen%20software -- quality%20management%20system
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Mergen Software Quality Management System allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Quality Management System: before v1.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-2865|2024-03-25T13:22:23.993Z -- mergen%20software -- quality%20management%20system
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Mergen Software Quality Management System allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Quality Management System: through 25032024.
